data.meta_description: RECOMMENDED AGE:  14+   MUSIC BY ALAN MENKEN LYRICS BY GLENN SLATER BOOK BY CHERI STEINKELLNER & BILL STEINKELLNER
data.text:
Music by Alan menken

Lyrics by Glenn Slater

Book by Cheri STEINKELLNER & BILL STEINKELLNER

SISTER ACT is the feel-good musical comedy smash based on the hit 1992 film that has audiences jumping to their feet! Featuring original music by Tony- and eight-time Oscar winner, Alan Menken (Newsies, Beauty and the Beast, Little Shop of Horrors), this uplifting musical was nominated for five Tony Awards, including Best Musical. Filled with powerful gospel music, outrageous dancing and a truly moving story, Sister Act will leave audiences breathless.

DIRECTED BY Kalaylah Chisolm

MUSIC DIRECTED BY Lauren Wilson
